name: The Sapper
description:
A game based on a well-known puzzle game, but with a gameplay changed to the core. Now the field of mines is a hexagonal cell, which makes sweeping mines more complex and unpredictable. Find out how well you can neutralize the entire minefield by calculating the location of the mines.Features:
  • A game of logical thinking
  • Helps develop the ability to count and calculate
  • Improves reaction times and teaches you to think quickly
  • Simple controls
  • Compatibility on multiple platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux)

This game will make your brain work at full capacity and will teach you the ability to think and calculate quickly, as you have to carefully make your way through the minefield, neutralizing mines upon mines by marking them, until you find them all. You can not rely on your luck alone, you will have to think carefully. Each open cell has a number that indicates how many mines are located nearby. Based on this information, you have to decide which cell to reveal next. Be careful, as minefields do not forgive mistakes!
